name: Roads Less Travelled
tag_list: travel, online-travel-agent, experiential-holidays, adventure--holidays, ladakh, weekend--getaways, bike-trips
overview:
Roads Less Travelled, an young offbeat travel company is challenging the monotonous mass travel itineraries sold by big travel company’s. RLT has introduced experiential travel packages and local stays across the Himalayas for the evolving Indian traveller. RLT is building up a solid network of stays & travel operators who provide differentiated quality travel experience as crafted by RLT against the mass movement of hotels & the usual travel itineraries. One can log on to www.RLTgo.com to get a glimpse of the hard work done by the company in the Himalayan region.

“More and more travellers want to break out of the routine tourist circuits and experience the place as a local, learn the culture, try local cuisine and stay with local people,” said Sandeep Sandhar, founder of RLT. “We are seeing more families scrapping traditional Mussourie, Nainital, Shimla for more authentic travel experiences to places like Spiti, Kinnaur, Ladakh & interiors of Kumaon. This trend will continue as more vacation providers accommodate the growing demand so this category will expand. Whatever their interests may be, adventure and active travellers will find what they’re looking for at RLTgo.com.”

With RLTgo.com travellers can choose to learn the culture of Aryan Villages of Ladakh, stay with villagers in Kumaon, do home stays in Apple Orchards of Himachal or Tea Estates in West Bengal. For those desiring to explore the less frequented areas RLT offers more than 100 packages & 90 stays in 6 states across the Himalayan region, with a variety of travel options and programs to suit travellers needs.

Additional offerings from RLTgo.com include Village Walks, Eco-tourism, Heritage Vacations, Jeep Safaris, Photo Tours, Wildlife Safaris and Corporate Team Building adventures. The site also offers Trekking, Angling, Jeep Safari, Bike trips, Mountaineering, and stays in unique retreats and HomeStays. www.RLTgo.com is designed to help travelers easily research offbeat vacations. Travelers can navigate quickly through the site and find exactly what they are looking for.

About the Company

Roads Less Travelled is an offbeat travel company focusing on travel experiences & stays that are not readily available to Indian travellers. RLT wants Indian people to come out of the regular tourist traps and experience places like a real traveller. For the past one year the team has travelled to nooks & corners of Himalayas to discover hidden gems. Result of it can be found on the website www.RLTgo.com Sandeep Sandhar, the founder, is an avid traveller who has travelled across 25 states in India and has climbed Himalayan peaks. Prior to this venture he was working with Nat Geo Channel and has a total experience of 11 years across various corporates but found his calling in travel.
